data.title: Wolfenbüttel climate: Weather Wolfenbüttel & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Wolfenbüttel

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Wolfenbüttel

>>average temperature by month Wolfenbüttel

>>Weather Wolfenbüttel

The climate in Wolfenbüttel is warm and temperate. The precipitation levels in Wolfenbüttel are noteworthy, as there is rainfall even during the most arid month. This location is classified as Cfb by Köppen and Geiger. The mean yearly temperature recorded in Wolfenbüttel is 9.8 °C | 49.7 °F, as per the available data. About 755 mm | 29.7 inch of precipitation falls annually.

The specified area is located in the northern hemisphere of our planet. The onset of summer commences towards the conclusion of June and culminates by September. The season is characterized by a sequence of months, namely: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Wolfenbüttel

The driest month is February, with 49 mm | 1.9 inch of rain. The month of July experiences the highest amount of precipitation, with an average value of 81 mm | 3.2 inch.

average temperature by month Wolfenbüttel

July is the warmest month of the year. The temperature in July averages 18.8 °C | 65.9 °F. The month of January is characterized by the lowest temperatures, which have an average reading of 1.3 °C | 34.4 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Wolfenbüttel

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

There is a difference of 32 mm | 1 inch of precipitation between the driest and wettest months. The fluctuation of temperatures over the course of a year is referred to as temperature variation.

It has been observed that November exhibits the highest relative humidity, with a percentage of 85.70. On the other hand, July experiences the lowest relative humidity at an approximate rate of 68.16. According to the data, December is observed as the month with maximum rainy days (13.57) while April has recorded minimum rainfall during its tenure (10.97).

Wolfenbüttel weather and climate for every month

Airport close to Wolfenbüttel

The closest Airports of Wolfenbüttel are: Hannover Airport (HAJ) 65.95km,Erfurt-Weimar Airport (ERF) 135.30km,Leipzig/Halle Airport (LEJ) 142.34km
